analyzed: śākyasiṃhastotram
yaśodharā kṛtam
eṣaḥ hi bhavataḥ tātaḥ janma mṛtyu jarā antakaḥ
sarvārthasiddha nāmnā iti śākyasiṃhaḥ adhunā suta
yasya chāyām upāśritya divya ati sundaraḥ bhaveḥ
dvātriṃśat lakṣaṇa dharam pitaram darśaya adhunā
caturaśīti sāhasram strīṇām vihāya nirmadaḥ
tapovanam agāt yaḥ asau vandaya enam maharddhikam
sapta ratnāni rājyam ca mahā aiśvarya padam varam

original: hitvā pravrajito yo'sau taṃ darśaya jagadgurum || 4 ||
analyzed: hitvā pravrajitaḥ yaḥ asau tam darśaya jagadgurum
māyā ākhyāyāḥ pitāmahyāḥ yaḥ ajanat dakṣa kukṣitaḥ

original: lumbinyāmudayāt sūrya iva taṃ pitaraṃ nama || 5 ||
analyzed: lumbinyām udayāt sūryaḥ iva tam pitaram nama  /
abhayāyāḥ kula īśvaryāḥ yena pāda ambuje natam

original: traidhātukādhipaṃ devaṃ pitaraṃ tvaṃ sadā nama || 6 ||
analyzed: traidhātuka adhipam devam pitaram tvam sadā nama
viśvāmitram upādhyāyam yaḥ ayojayat susaṃvare
bāla krīḍā abhirakta ātmā tātam enam sadā nama
jambu taru samāsīnam pañcarṣayaḥ hata tviṣaḥ

original: nirmāninaḥ prābhajan yamenaṃ tātaṃ sadā nama || 8 ||
analyzed: nirmāninaḥ prābhajan yam enam tātam sadā nama
pitaram bodhayitvā yaḥ atyājayat tu ṣaṣ aṃśakam
dayā karam jagat vandyam janakam praṇama ātmaja
yaḥ ajayat devadatta ādīn māninaḥ sarva vid sudhīḥ
sarva phalāt idam vijñam sudhiyam janakam bhaja
yātrāyām āturam jīrṇam mṛtam dṛṣṭi vivarjitam

original: svayaṃ vijño'pi papraccha sadā taṃ janakaṃ bhaja || 11 ||
analyzed: svayam vijñaḥ api papraccha sadā tam janakam bhaja
kāma agniḥ na aharat yasya cittam pramada vāsinaḥ

original: nirañjanaṃ nirvikalpaṃ suta taṃ janakaṃ bhaja || 12 ||
analyzed: nirañjanam nirvikalpam suta tam janakam bhaja
kanakāśvam samāruhya chandakena bahis yayau
deśāt niśīthe tridaśaiḥ stūyamānam mudā bhaja
hayam nivartayāmāsa chandakam ca tapaḥ vanāt
su kaṇṭha ābharaṇam dattvā bhaṇa enam vana cāriṇam
nairañjanām upāsṛtya prākarot yaḥ tapaḥ vratam
jagat hita artham ṣaṣ varṣam enam bhaja tapaḥ param
bodhi druma samāsīnaḥ jitvā māram su duḥsaham
prālabhat bodhi ratnam yaḥ darśaya enam tathāgatam
mṛgadāva sthitaḥ kāśyām dharmacarkra pravartayan
brahma ādibhiḥ vṛtaḥ yaḥ asau darśaya enam gurum suta
iti mātrā uditam śrutvā rāhulaḥ saḥ ati vismitaḥ
praṇamya pitaram paśyan mudam āpa smita ānanaḥ
śrī śākyasiṃhastotram yaśodharā kṛtam samāptam
